ModMetaData.name: More Scenario Options - Research
ModMetaData.author: Rensen
ModMetaData.description:
Adds more research related options for the scenario editor. - Set techlevel to: Change the techlevel of your faction - Remove all starting Research: Start with no research - No research more advanced than: all rearch higher than your techlevel + the number you set are disabled.
Update 30.04.2020: Your techlevel selection should get saved now
